resources.string: This activity displays all the categories available on the app
This activity displays a list of albums, with their author and the title of the album
This activity displays a list of artists with the number of their albums available on the app
This activity displays a list of genre, to enable the user to listen to a certain type of music
This activity shows a track when it is playing
This activity displays a list of song from an album of an artist
This activity shows the use of Google Pay API

The Android Pay API offers a quick and easy path to enable secure, one touch payments. \n It provided methods to request and receive encrypted shipping and payment information about the user, to allow the user to change or update their information and to execute a transaction.
